Authenticate with formr

formr_api_authenticate.Rd

Connects to the API. If no credentials are provided, it tries to find them in the keyring.

Usage

formr_api_authenticate(
  host = "https://formr.org",
  client_id = NULL,
  client_secret = NULL,
  access_token = NULL
)

Arguments

host

API Base URL.

client_id

OAuth Client ID.

client_secret

OAuth Client Secret.

access_token

Direct Access Token.

On this page
